hw1
Class TicketUtil

java.lang.Object
  hw1.TicketUtil

public class TicketUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is the utility class for the Ticket System. It run calculations for ticket fairs and holds the values of all the FINAL values of the system.

Author:
Michael Lux Section 14 Professor Kautz

Method Detail

calculateRideCost

public static int calculateRideCost(int startZone,
                                    int endZone,
                                    boolean discounted)
Calculates the cost of a ride (in pennies) from a start zone to an end zone, taking into account if the ticket has a discount or not.

Parameters:
startZone - this is where the ticket is swiped in on a turnstile
endZone - this is where the ticket is swiped out on a turnstile
discounted - this is whether or not the card is a discount card
Returns:
this will return the total cost (in pennies) of the ride

calculateRideCost

public static int calculateRideCost(int numRides,
                                    int startZone,
                                    int endZone,
                                    boolean discounted)
Calculates the cost of a ride (in pennies) from a start zone to an end zone, taking into account if the ticket has a discount or not, and then multiplies it by the desired number of rides.

Parameters:
numRides - the number of desired rides between the desired zones
startZone - this is where the ticket is swiped in on a turnstile
endZone - this is where the ticket is swiped out on a turnstile
discounted - this is whether or not the card is a discount card
Returns:
this will return the total cost (in pennies) of the ride

getMinimumFare

public static int getMinimumFare(boolean discounted)
Checks the if a card is discounted or not, then returns the appropriate minimum fare for that particular ticket.

Parameters:
discounted - whether or not that particular ticket gets discounts or not
Returns:
the value of the minimum fare for that ticket
